title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
e. Now we just need to find the vampire himself.

Once you make your way into the palace, you will need to find Cazador's lair. There will be a large Sinister door you will need to get through. In order to open the Sinister Door in Cazador's Palace, you need to find Kozakuran Dictionary in a necrotic room and Szarr Family Ring on Godey. Both are on the 1st floor of the palace.

If Astarion is missing during your playthrough, you will also find him with Godey.

(Kozakuran Dictionary in a Wardrobe
